description: Enterprise techniques mitigated by Threat Intelligence Program, ATT&CK mitigation M1019 (v1.1)
name: Threat Intelligence Program (M1019)

techniques.comment: Develop a robust cyber threat intelligence capability to determine what types and levels of threat may use software exploits and 0-days against a particular organization.

Threat intelligence helps defenders and users be aware of and defend against common lures and active campaigns that have been used for impersonation.
